Roll Dice, Collect Goods/Foods: You start with three pre circled.

Collect Goods: Having a dice with a goods symbol
Starting from the bottom row shift one to the right.
More Goods, then go up a row and shift one to the right.
If the row was full you don't collect it but it still counts.

Collect Food: Advanced food peg one position for each food symbol on the dice.
Don't collect food if row was full.

Trackin lost points: Check Disasters Box for each point lost.
These will be subtracted from your score EOG.

Build Cities/Monuments: Check off a box in the City or Monument.
Once it's all checked it's built.

If you're the first specific monument bu: Circle the larger number of points.

buy a development: You may buy one development per turn.
Buy **** and goods equal to the cost.
If you spend goods you must spend all goods of that type.

Discard Goods: You may only keep 6 goods total.
Move pegs left until you have 6 goods.
Pass the dice to the next player.

Game End: Each monument has been built once.
Play until the end of round.

Scoring: Subtract one point for every disaster.
